title: Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Bedroom", 1934-1935
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with dimensions and instructions
description: Plan for bedroom on Lady Esther Yacht. Entrance on left wall at center; wrap-around cabinets and drawers on left and lower wall. Chaise lounge in lower right corner facing entrance. Vanity with curved left side on wall at right with circular vanity bench. Double-bed on upper left wall, flanked by night table at each side. Large, walk-in wardrobe in upper right corner of room. Large bathroom at right with tub/shower, sink, and toilet.
